playerbio.label: I am a Rwandan professional footballer who plays as a defender. I have played for clubs in Rwanda, Uganda, and Kenya, including APR, SC Villa, and Gor Mahia. I have also played for the Rwanda national team, making my debut in 2010.

I have won the Rwandan Premier League, the Rwandan Cup, and the Rwandan Super Cup with APR, as well as the Ugandan Premier League with SC Villa. I have also won the CECAFA Cup with the Rwanda national team. I am known for my defensive skills, positioning, and leadership on the field.

I have been a key player for the Rwanda national team since 2018, helping the team reach the quarter-finals of the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations. I am a versatile defender who can play in a variety of positions, including center-back, right-back, and left-back. I am also known for my aerial ability, tackling, and passing.
